name: clutchball
description:
Dodgeball deathmatch in a huge arena - anything's allowed! Throw balls at waves of opponents, unlock teammates to help you get further and reach the final boss!

Features
  • Around 30 minutes of gameplay
  • Unlock teammates to help you fight the good fight
  • Hit opponents in the head
  • Hit opponents in the chest
  • Banger trap soundtrack


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
